Hello Viber Team, I would like to suggest adding a privacy option similar to Telegram ‚Äî the ability to show my ‚ÄúLast Seen‚Äù only to specific contacts I choose. This would help users have more control over their privacy and decide who can see their activity status. Thank you for considering my suggestion! Best regards, [MD]

Request for selective Last Seen feature I really enjoy using Viber ‚Äî it‚Äôs fast, reliable, and user-friendly. However, I would love if Viber could add a selective Last Seen / Online status feature, like Telegram, so that we can choose who can see our online activity. This would greatly improve user privacy and control. Please consider adding this feature in a future update. Thank you!
